MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Scales for Outcomes in Parkinsons Disease - Autonomic Dysfunction

scopa_01.Description: In the past month, have you had difficulty swallowing or have you choked?

scopa_02.Description: In the past month, has saliva dribbled out of your mouth?

scopa_03.Description: In the past month, has food ever become stuck in your throat?

scopa_04.Description: In the past month, did you ever have the feeling during a meal that you were full very quickly?

scopa_05.Description: In the past month, have you had problems with constipation?

scopa_06.Description: In the past month, did you have to strain hard to pass stools?

scopa_07.Description: In the past month, have you had difficulty retaining urine?

scopa_14.Description: In the past month, when standing up have you had the feeling of either becoming lightheaded, or no longer being able to see properly, or no longer being able to think clearly?

scopa_15.Description: In the past month, did you become light-headed after standing for some time?

scopa_16.Description: Have you fainted in the past 6 months?

scopa_17.Description: In the past month, have you ever perspired excessively during the day?

scopa_18.Description: In the past month, have you ever perspired excessively during the night?

scopa_19.Description: In the past month, have your eyes ever been over-sensitive to bright light?

scopa_20.Description: In the past month, how often have you had trouble tolerating cold?

scopa_21.Description: In the past month, how often have you had trouble tolerating heat?

scopa_26a.Description: In the past month, have you used medication for constipation?

scopa_26b.LongName: SCOPA-AUT Q26b: Medication for urinary problems
scopa_26b.Description: In the past month, have you used medication for urinary problems?

scopa_26c.Description: In the past month, have you used medication for blood-pressure?

scopa_26d.Description: In the past month, have you used medication for other symptoms?
